    • Method Detail

      • expandExternal

        public void expandExternal​(IPosition<T> p,
                           T e)
        Expand an external node (position) - Store a value in the external node (position) - Create two external nodes as children, making position p an internal node
        Parameters:
        p - The position to expand. An exception will be thrown if it is not external.
        e - The value to be stored in position p.

      • remove

        Remove a node (position) from the tree
